definition[0]: to make something by combining different things or substances
example[0]: DDT is a pesticide that was first synthesized in 1874.
definition[1]: to combine separate things into a complete whole
definition[2]: to produce sounds, speech, or music electronically
definition[3]: to produce something by combining different things, especially to create something that is similar to a natural product
example[1]: Researchers first synthesized the anti-depressant drug in 1972.
example[2]: The technique may allow scientists to synthesize large diamonds more cheaply than they can be mined.
